name: PosterBoard
0:
”Alexa, Open Poster Board.”
”Alexa, Ask Poster Board to tell me a message.”
”Alexa, Ask Poster Board to send a message.”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: poster board
des:
Poster Board is an anonymous localized messaging system which will play your messages for other people in your area. Use it to give out info about something happening in your area, share a quick anonymous message, or tell a joke. Then listen to other people's messages, and vote them up or down to make sure the best messages are heard while lousy messages are buried forever, kind of like reddit's voting system!

To get started, open Poster Board and follow along the quick tutorial, then you have opened your portal to the world of posting anonymous messages on your Alexa enabled device. You will have to approve the skill's access to your address information, which we keep on file to make a location profile for you.
